mapper.sql: id, operator_id, source, stall_id, operation, lock_sn, create_time, status, modify_time
mapper.update: update t_lock_operate_log set operator_id = #{operatorId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, source = #{source,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, stall_id = #{stallId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, operation = #{operation,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, lock_sn = #{lockSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
